CHAT.comment: Teaching. Mother and Child sit on the floor in the living+room. Mother first teaches Child to string beads on a shoelace. Then , she teaches him to sort black and white buttons into two small boxes. About half of what Child says is intelligible.

u.a: tries to put string through bead which Mother holds .
gives string and bead to Mother .
strings bead , not teaching , just seeing if she thinks he can do it .
tries to put bead on string Mother holds .
holds string and bead to Mother .
holds out string and bead to Mother .
holds out square bead to Child .
starts to put button in white box .
starts to put button in box .
